extension.name: Hikashop Orders Automatic Cancel Plugin
extension.author: Hikashop
extension.description: This plugin enables you to have the orders automatically cancelled after some time

param.name: period
param.label: Period
param.description: Period before an order is cancelled (in seconds)

param.name: last_cron_update
param.label: Last update
param.description: Last date on which the orders were checked via the CRON task
